name: Deadbug
setup: Lie on back, arms toward ceiling, hips/knees at 90°
Flatten low back gently to floor by exhaling and bracing
steps: Inhale through nose; on exhale, extend opposite arm and leg toward floor
Keep low back pressed down; pause briefly, then return
Alternate sides with control, maintaining rib-to-pelvis connection
cues: Ribs down; zipper ribs to hips
Exhale to brace, inhale to reset
safety: If low back discomfort appears, reduce range (shorten lever), elevate legs on a box, or switch to iso deadbug holds.

regressions: Iso deadbug hold (alternate only arms or only legs)
Heels on box with alternating arms

prescriptionHints.load: Bodyweight; 2–10 lb per hand if weighted
prescriptionHints.notes: Quality breathing and rib position first; fewer, better reps.

joints.notes: Posteriorly tilt pelvis to keep lumbar spine neutral against floor.
